metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28044 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Irzip v0.640 was discovered to contain a heap memory corruption via thecomponent lrzip.c:initialise_control.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28044` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.651-2ubuntu0.22.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lrzip package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.651-2ubuntu0.22.04.1').
